name: Export
description: Export all data from a FHIR server. More details regarding bulk export can be found [here] [http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html]. This operation is asynchronous as defined in the [FHIR Asynchronous Request Pattern](http://hl7.org/fhir/async.html)

parameter.name: _outputFormat
parameter.documentation: The format for the requested bulk data files to be generated. Supported formats - `application/fhir+ndjson`.

parameter.name: _since
parameter.documentation: Resources updated after this period will be included in the response.

parameter.name: _till
parameter.documentation: Resources updated before this period will be included in the response.

parameter.name: _type
parameter.documentation: A string of comma-delimited FHIR resource types. Only resources of the specified resource types(s) will be included in the response.

parameter.name: _typeFilter
parameter.documentation: (Experimental) Search filters to refine a type search. See https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html#experimental-query-parameters for formating. This parameter is experimental and the behavior may change.

parameter.name: _isParallel
parameter.documentation: Whether to divide the job into multiple parallel operations. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: _maxCount
parameter.documentation: The number of resources to load per request in an export job. Higher values can improve performance, but values that are too high can cause the process to run out of memory. A value of 0 uses the system default. Defaults to 0.
